data.title: Nancy Louviere Marsh Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: Nancy Ann Louviere Marsh, age 61, passed away on May 30, 2024. Nancy was born the baby of 11 children. Nancy was married to Jerry for 43 years and she was a rural postal carrier...
data.text:
Nancy Ann Louviere Marsh, age 61, passed away on May 30, 2024. Nancy was born the baby of 11 children. Nancy was married to Jerry for 43 years and she was a rural postal carrier for 40 years. She also was an instructor at the Rural Carrier Academy. Nancy was an active member in The Louisiana Rural Letter Carriers Association where she served as local steward, past district president and past Louisiana State President. She loved her family, traveling and helping others. If you caught her at home, she was probably cooking.

Preceded in death by parents Peter and Daisy Louviere, Brothers Kenward, Timothy, Wayne, Glen, Gene, and Daniel Louviere, brother-in- law Mark (Red) Andre, Nephews James Lee Louviere, Derick Chenevert and William Jarratt, Nieces Vickie Claire Louviere and Tabatha Loup.

Survived by husband Jerry Marsh, children Jeremy and wife Melissa Marsh, Heather Marsh and special friend Tessa Saizon, and Brock Marsh, siblings Angela Andre, James (T-Jim) Louviere, Gloria Perez and husband Carl, grandchildren Cameron Gray, Hayley and Kaylynn Maisonneuve and Jamey Marsh, grandpuppies: Rayne, Sunny, Tonka and Ryleigh, and special Feline: Max (the biting) cat. Also survived by a host of nieces, and nephews.

Relatives and friends are invited to the visitation on Wednesday, June 5, 2024, at Immaculate Heart of Mary Catholic Church, 11140 Highway 77, Maringouin, LA, from 12PM to 2PM, the Mass to begin at 2PM. In lieu of flowers, memorial gifts are preferred. St Jude Dream Day foundation has a special site set up for Nancyâ€™s Memorial.
